job_tasks.phrase: Denk je mee met opdrachtgevers over het implementeren van machine learning modellen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates collaboration with clients to understand their needs and translate them into ML model implementations, demonstrating business context alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Pas je verschillende vormen van Machine Learning toe in de contexten van beeldherkenning, Natural Language Processing, Spraakherkenning, Spraakgeneratie en Recommending Systems alsmede nieuwe en andere vormen van ML en het inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This directly describes the application and implementation of various ML techniques and models for specific AI tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Participeer je in projecten waar generatieve AI wordt gebruikt. Je implementeert daar ook oplossingen met retrieval-augmented generation of andere relevante technieken in de context van generatieve AI.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions participation in generative AI projects and the implementation of techniques like RAG, falling under the modeling category.
Building model training scripts is a core activity in the process of creating and training machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Bouw, implementeer, verbeter en onderhoud je AI standaard oplossingen en ML/Deep Learning oplossingen in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties (apps, webservices, en evt. andere frontends etc.).
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the engineering and deployment of ML/AI solutions into various application types, which is software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Zorg je voor de vertaling van complexe Machine Learning naar bruikbare applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: Translating complex ML into usable applications involves software development to create user-facing products.

job_tasks.phrase: het inbouwen hiervan in bestaande applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating ML solutions into existing applications is a software development task.
Building data pipelines is a key component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Ben je bezig met het verzamelen, opschonen en evalueren van data en met verbindingen maken met data bronnen.
job_tasks.justification: These activities (collecting, cleaning, evaluating data, connecting to sources) are all part of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeer, ... onderhoud je AI standaard oplossingen en ML/Deep Learning oplossingen in nieuwe en bestaande applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Implementing and maintaining solutions in production environments implies MLOps responsibilities.
Developing or integrating with frontends is part of software development.

soft_skills.phrase: Denk je mee met opdrachtgevers over het implementeren van machine learning modellen.
Ben jij een ambitieuze machine learning engineer en wil je AI inzetten voor een verbetere dienstverlening van de Nederlandse overheid?
Denk je mee in vraagstukken rondom kaders en ethiek binnen de context van artificial intelligence.
Geef je samen met de AI architect presentaties over AI.

classification.rationale: While the job involves Generative AI, the core responsibilities heavily emphasize building, implementing, improving, and maintaining ML/Deep Learning solutions, including data pipelines and model training scripts. The description focuses on a broader application of ML across various domains rather than exclusively on LLM/GenAI application development, aligning more with the ML Engineer profile.
